subsection_content:
If the following symptoms appear, the patient needs to see a doctor for appropriate treatment before the condition gets worse: (4)
The patient notices warts appearing on the face, mouth, nose, torso or other parts of the body such as the genitals.; The patient sees signs of bleeding and infection such as pus and scabs around the warts.; Warts cause pain to the patient; People with warts have other diseases such as diabetes and immunodeficiency such as HIV/AIDS.
subsection_title: mun coc.json. When to see a doctor?
subsection_data:
mun coc.json. When to see a doctor?
If the following symptoms appear, the patient needs to see a doctor for appropriate treatment before the condition gets worse: (4)
The patient notices warts appearing on the face, mouth, nose, torso or other parts of the body such as the genitals.; The patient sees signs of bleeding and infection such as pus and scabs around the warts.; Warts cause pain to the patient; People with warts have other diseases such as diabetes and immunodeficiency such as HIV/AIDS.
